htmlSnippet: We believe every great hire starts with hello. Our conversational software automates recruiting tasks like screening, interview scheduling, and onboarding ...

metatags.twitter:title: Conversational hiring software that gets work done for you — Paradox
metatags.twitter:description: We believe every great hire starts with hello. Our conversational software automates recruiting tasks like screening, interview scheduling, and onboarding to get your candidates from hello to hired faster, and easier, than ever.
metatags.og:title: Conversational hiring software that gets work done for you — Paradox
metatags.og:description: We believe every great hire starts with hello. Our conversational software automates recruiting tasks like screening, interview scheduling, and onboarding to get your candidates from hello to hired faster, and easier, than ever.

content: Hiring takes time. But our AI assistant Olivia gives you more of it — automating tasks so you spend more time with people, not software.
